title: Implement user story validation feedback system
description: Create a real-time validation system that provides immediate feedback when users create or edit user stories, ensuring they meet INVEST criteria before saving
asA: product manager using the AIPM workspace
iWant: immediate validation feedback when creating or editing user stories
soThat: I can ensure all stories meet INVEST criteria and maintain high quality standards
acceptanceCriteria: Validation runs automatically when user types in story fields
INVEST criteria violations are highlighted with specific error messages
Save button is disabled until all critical validation issues are resolved
Warning messages appear for potential issues that don't block saving
Validation feedback updates in real-time as user makes corrections
System provides helpful suggestions for improving story quality
